name: Squongle Planet
description:
CONTROLS:
  • ARROWS OR WASD TO MOVE
  • LEFT CLICK TO GRAB
  • SCROLL WHEEL WHEN GRABBING TO BRING THEM CLOSER OR FURTHER
  • O AND P TO ZOOM

An interactive planet simulator thingy

Watch the simple yet lovable Squongles go about their daily lives 

Or throw them into deep space

Don't worry, they'll come back down eventually

...

maybe

Browser version may lag a bit, download the desktop version for better performance.
